Zone

Zone class is used to define placeholders in views and layouts

Summary
Zone
Zone class is used to define placeholders in views and layouts
License
This file is licensed under the MIT.
Functions
write
Opens Zone for Writing.
flush
Flushes write buffer and stores Zone data.
render
Renders Zone.

License

This file is licensed under the MIT.

Functions

write

public static function write($zone)

Opens Zone for Writing.

Parameters

string $zoneName of the Zone to open write buffer for.

flush

public static function flush()

Flushes write buffer and stores Zone data.

render

public static function render($zone)

Renders Zone.

Parameters

string $zoneName of the Zone to render.

Returns

trueif there was data written on $zone.
falseif there is nothing to render.
